summary: Implements the clientâ€‘side bindings for the Windows Terminal Services (TSTS) DCE/RPC interface, defining NDR structures, helper containers and a set of RPC calls that allow enumeration, query, configuration and control of WinStation (Remote Desktop) sessions on a remote host.
business_intent: Provide a programmatic way to interact with Windows Terminal Services for remote administration, monitoring and manipulation of user sessions, including retrieving session data, managing connections, and performing actions such as shadowing or logoff.
